attributes.action: Not allow e-petitions to be used for individuals comments of a political nature - see petition "British Residents in France and the new Franch laws regarding health system" a Mr D Porter comments regarding the NHS should adopt the same policy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mr D Porter should not be allowed to aire his polictical opinion such as he has done on the e-petition regarding the French Health system and UK citizens living in France.  Firstly, Mr Porter obviously has no other platform to comment on things which he really has no idea.  Secondly he should not use this platform as a personal political stance.  Filter such people out please Downing Street.  The e-petitions are not designed for this.

rejection.details: This will be used as feedback. Many thanks.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
